elements.text: You have been at your current job for a while, and your boss asks if you would be interested in changing roles. You feel excited about a change at first, but you worry how your future symptoms might affect your work. You think about how you have plenty of support from a variety of people and know you can...

elements.name: Job change_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
